 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָוָה‎</span>] ==join== (intransitive), ==be joined== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִוָּה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליוה‎</span>) transitive, Hithpa\`el intransitive; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לַוִּי‎</span> ***accompany***; so <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 12</sup> compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> be ***near***); — 

**Qal** (late) ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלְוֶנּוּ‎</span> EC [[Gen.8.13|Gen 8:13]], ***be joined to, attend*** (of mirth). **Niph\`al** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְוָה‎</span> [[Ps.83.9|Ps 83:9]]; [[Isa.14.1|Isa 14:1]] 3 masculine plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנִלְווּ‎</span> [[Num.18.4|Num 18:4]] + 2 t., + [[Jer.50.5|Jer 50:5]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>Lbg.</sup> [[BDB#Bö|Bö]] [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 588</sup> [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]; &gt; ***Imperative*** [[BDB#Ki|Ki]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§ 226c</sup> [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 264</sup>); ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּוֶה‎</span> [[Gen.29.34|Gen 29:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִלָּווּ‎</span> [[Num.18.2|Num 18:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְוָה‎</span> [[Isa.56.3|Isa 56:3]] (pointed as Perfect, read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְוֶה‎</span>); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְוִים‎</span> [[Esth.9.27|Esth 9:27]]; [[Isa.56.6|Isa 56:6]] — ***join oneself*** or ***be joined*** unto, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Num.18.2|Num 18:2]]; [[Num.18.4|Num 18:4]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַטֵּה לֵנִי‎</span> to Aaron, by word-play), [[Isa.14.1|Isa 14:1]] (strangers to Israel), [[Dan.11.34|Dan 11:34]] (flatterers to the people), compare [[Esth.9.27|Esth 9:27]]; [[Isa.56.6|Isa 56:6]] (to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[Isa.56.3|Isa 56:3]] (to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Zech.2.15|Zech 2:15]] (to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Jer.50.5|Jer 50:5]] (to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), [[Gen.29.34|Gen 29:34]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; husband to wife); followed by<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[Ps.83.9|Ps 83:9]] (Asshur with enemies of Israel) 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָוָה‎</span>] **verb** ==borrow== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***delay payment of debt*** (compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ES 12</sup> ); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָוִ֫ינוּ‎</span> [[Neh.5.4|Neh 5:4]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלְוֶה‎</span> [[Deut.28.12|Deut 28:12]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹוֶה‎</span> [[Prov.22.7|Prov 22:7]] + 2 t.; — ***borrow***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶבֶד לוֶֹה לְאִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְוֶה‎</span> [[Prov.22.7|Prov 22:7]] ***a borrower is slave to a man who lends***; absolute [[Deut.28.12|Deut 28:12]]; [[Isa.24.2|Isa 24:2]]; [[Ps.37.21|Ps 37:21]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף‎</span> [[Neh.5.4|Neh 5:4]]. **Hiph\`il** Perfect 2 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִלְוִיתָה‎</span> [[Deut.28.12|Deut 28:12]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַלְוְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.28.44|Deut 28:44]] 2 masculine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּלְוֶה‎</span> [[Exod.22.24|Exod 22:24]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּלְוֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Deut.28.44|Deut 28:44]] Participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְוֶה‎</span> [[Ps.37.26|Ps 37:26]] + 3 t., construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְוֵה‎</span> [[Prov.19.17|Prov 19:17]] — ***cause to borrow***, i.e. ***lend to***, with accusative of person + of thing [[Exod.22.24|Exod 22:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); with accusative of person [[Deut.28.12|Deut 28:12]]; [[Deut.28.44|Deut 28:44]] (twice in verse); absolute [[Ps.37.26|Ps 37:26]]; [[Ps.112.5|Ps 112:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מַלְוֶה‎</span> [[Prov.22.77|Prov 22:77]] (see **Qal** ==above==); as substantive [[Isa.24.2|Isa 24:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְוֵה י‎</span> [[Prov.19.17|Prov 19:17]] ***a lender to*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> is one shewing favour to the poor.
